titleStmt.title: Whereas we are informed that to the disadvantage of His Majesties service, divers officers of His Majesties army in this kingdom do absent themselves from their several quarters without our license, and whereas upon the accompt of the last harvest ... by the Lord Deputy Generall of Ireland, Ossory.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Deputy.
Ossory, Thomas Butler, Earl of, 1634-1680.

notesStmt.note: Title from first 5 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at His Majesties castle of Dublin the 29th day of January, 1668" [1669]
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
